title: Science Teaching Method Design in Blended Learning Environments Using Q Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with project-based learning
context.additional_context: Conducted as a blended learning approach combining face-to-face, flipped, and online learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Learners are science field professionals (administrative/managerial), with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes

learning_goals: The core principles of Q methodology and its application strategies in educational research can be explained
Real-time data collection and analysis using Q-Perspectives® Online tools in blended learning environments can be performed
A PBL project can be designed and implemented to improve science teaching methods based on learner perception survey results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
